name: Quil Email Generation
description: Generate personalized recruiting outreach emails based on candidate profile

questions.helpText: Compelling subject line that will get opened
First 1-2 sentences that grab attention and show personalization
Specific details from their background (education, companies, projects)
Why this opportunity is compelling for them specifically
What action do you want them to take?
What tone matches this candidate and role?
How good is this email? Is it personalized, compelling, clear?
How could this email be better?

rendering.customCSS: .email-preview { background: white; border: 1px solid #e5e7eb; border-radius: 0.5rem; padding: 1.5rem; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif; } .email-subject { font-weight: 600; font-size: 1.125rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; padding-bottom: 0.5rem; border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e7eb; } .email-body { line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap; } .personalization-tag { background: #dbeafe; color: #1e40af; padding: 0.125rem 0.5rem; border-radius: 0.25rem; font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 500; }

iclFormat.systemPrompt: You are an expert recruiting copywriter who writes personalized, compelling outreach emails.
